Subject: Resolve problems with Google Nest Wifi Router

I am encountering connectivity issues with my Google Nest Wifi Router that are impacting my work on digital strategy You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. Despite attempting to restart the router, the problem continues. I kindly request your assistance in quickly addressing this issue. Could you please advise on the next steps I should take? My name is Elena Ivanova.
